entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605

Closed

  • project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for '.NETStandard,Version=v2.0' #2563
    Discussion
  • clearer exception when calling dotnet pack on global tool that depends on packages with `dependency` #9564
    Backlog
  • Reference to project with Nuget packet lead to deploying packet assembly into destination folder even if set Private and CopyLocalSatelliteAssemblies. #2491
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Make dotnet-watch tests TFM agnostic #44604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Increase Arm64 test build timeout #44595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
